data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yeates, David K., Wiegmann, Brian M., Courtney, Greg W., Meier, Rudolf, Lambkin, Christine, Pape, Thomas (2007): Phylogeny and systematics of Diptera: Two decades of progress and prospects *. Zootaxa 1668: 565-590, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.180150
